dessert.name: Classic Tiramisu
dessert.instructions:
HOW TO PREPARE

☆ Whisk egg yolks and sugar until creamy.

☆ Add mascarpone and vanilla extract, mix well.

☆ Dip ladyfingers in coffee and layer them in a dish.

☆ Chill for 4 hours and dust with cocoa before serving.

extraContent.chefTips: Use espresso for an authentic taste and let it chill overnigh for better flavor.

dessert.name: Molten Brown Sundae
dessert.instructions:
HOW TO PREPARE

☆ Preheat oven to 180°C (356°F).

☆ Melt chocolate and butter together.

☆ Whisk egg and sugar, then mix in melted chocolate.

☆ Sift in flour and stir gently.

☆ Bake for 10-15 minutes until just set.

☆ Serve warm with ice cream

extraContent.chefTips: Sightly underbake for a fudgier texture.

dessert.name: Apple Crumble
dessert.instructions:
HOW TO PREPARE

☆ Preheat oven to 180°C (356°F).

☆ Peel and slice apples, mix with cinnamon and sugar.

☆In a bowl, mix flour, oats, and butter until crumbly.

☆ Layer apples in a bakinh dish and sprinkle crumble mixture on top.

☆ Bake for 25-30 minutes until golden brown.

extraContent.chefTips: Use tart apples like Granny Smith for a balanced sweetness

dessert.name: Vanilla Panna Cotta
dessert.instructions:
HOW TO PREPARE

☆ Soak gelatin sheets in cold water.

☆ Heat cream, sugar, and vanilla until warm.

☆ Pour into molds and refrigerate for 4 hours.

☆ Serve with fresh berries or caramel sauce.

extraContent.chefTips: Do not boil the cream; heat it gently to avoid crumbling.

dessert.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
dessert.instructions:
HOW TO PREPARE

☆ Preheat oven to 200°C (392°F). Grease ramekins with butter and dust with cocoa powder.

☆ Melt chocolate and butter together over low heat.

☆ Whisk eggs, yolk, and sugar until light and fluffy.

☆ Fold in melted chocolate, then sift in flour.

☆ Pour batter into ramekims and bake for 8-10 minutess.

☆ Serve immediately with ice cream to taste

extraContent.chefTips: Use high-quality chocolate for a richer taste. Do not Overbake to maintain the gooey center

pizza.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
pizza.description: A creamy and flavorful Italian classic with eggs, cheese, and pancetta.
pizza.shortInstructions: Boil pasta, cook pancetta, mix with eggs and cheese.
pizza.instructions: Cook pasta until al dente. In a pan, fry pancetta until crispy. In a bowl, whisk eggs with grated Parmesan. Toss hot pasta with egg mixture and pancetta. Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

extraContent.chefTips: For the best Carbonara, use freshly grated Parmesan and avoid adding cream!

pizza.name: Penne Arrabbiata
pizza.description: A spicy and delicious pasta with rich tomato sauce and chili flakes.
pizza.shortInstructions: Cook pasta, sauté garlic and chili, add tomatoes, mix.
pizza.instructions: Cook pasta in boiling salted water until al dente. In a pan, heat olive oil and sauté minced garlic with chili flakes. Add canned tomatoes, season with salt, and let simmer for 10 minutes. Toss pasta into the sauce, mix well, and serve with fresh basil.

extraContent.chefTips: Add fresh basil for an extra aromatic touch.
